climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,161,961 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics) #10,369 in Vehicle GPS Units & Equipment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Displays highway merges with better resolution screen and enhanced sound
reviews.reviewText: Love it! The only problem was 2013 maps installed so it took all night to update the maps but it was free. Now I have a good as new Garmin that helps me to navigate so much better than my old Garmin. It tells me which lane to be in for those big highway merges, has a better resolution screen (that you can set very bright) with enhanced sound. I couldn't have made it through Brooklyn and Manhattan on my way to New Jersy on Saturday without it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First impression is good
reviews.reviewText: First impression is reasonably good: it is a bit less intuitive to use some other models but the image seems to be clear also in sunlight. I have had some bad luck with GPS devices, one TomTom and one Magellan failed on me one after the other so I am trying Garmin now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and so reliable
reviews.reviewText: Love the split pane when an exit is coming up. I have trusted Garmin for years and only got a new one because mine was too old for additional updates. I enthusiastically recommend these to my friends. Thanks for a great GPS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Faulty Garmin Nüvi 2557LM 5-Inch Portable Vehicle GPS.
reviews.reviewText: Right out of the box, this unit had trouble charging. I tried a new cable and was able to get a charge by positioning the cable a certain way, which worked but made updates difficult since the unit kept reporting it lost charging and would start to shutdown. I've had the device less than one year but am discovering that the one year warranty listed on the product page isn't worth anything. My first disappointing purchase and customer experience buying an Amazon Prime item from a reputable seller (presumably Garmin).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I've had Garmin Nuvi's for 6 years and love them. This one is terrible
reviews.reviewText: I've had Garmin Nuvi's for 6 years and love them. This one is terrible. It doesn't ask you for a state or city before you put in the address, it just automatically keeps searching in states I don't live in, and when I finally get it to change the city or state I'm looking for an address in, it keeps saying "sorry address can not be found". VERY disappointed. I will go back to the dealer I've gotten Garmins from before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Worked, however, on-off switch was funky. My wife has problems with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, looks new
reviews.reviewText: Works great, looks new, easy to configure! Was hesitant about it being refurbishes, but the product has been working just fine; I was able to manage 5 road trip with this. Updated the maps, took me almost an hour. Satisfied with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished. No Problem. Saved money. My only ...
reviews.reviewText: Refurbished. No Problem. Saved money. My only complaint is that sometimes it will just shut down on its own. Not sure whats up with that. But other than that go for it. Buy ITTTTTT!!!!
